                      IDatabase db)
Constructor for file system

Parameters:
scriptsFolder - Folder which contains the scripts
ftpFolder - Folder in which the courses are uploaded via FTP
coursesFolder - Folder which contains all the courses folders
liveFolder - Folder which contains all the media for the live
coursesUrl - The URL of courses
defaultMp3File - Default MP3 filename in the archive sent by the client
defaultFlashFile - Default Flash filename in the archive sent by the client
comment - Copyright comment
